item.title: Elliott's plan for PepsiCo includes investing in some of its iconic brands, shedding others
item.description: Elliott Investment Management says PepsiCo neglected its core soda brands and is selling way too many products.

item.title: Alphabet and these two other stocks are overbought with the market near all-time highs
item.description: The S&P 500 closed at a record on Thursday, as traders tied bets on risk assets to hopes for a September interest rate cut from the Federal Reserve.

item.title: Goldman says these stocks have 'earnings power' so buy them now
item.description: Goldman Sachs analysts say they like stocks that have 'earnings power.'

item.title: Buy this chemical manufacturer poised for a recovery, says Carter Worth
item.description: Chart analyst Carter Worth breaks down the improving technical outlook on this stock.

item.title: Bank of America initiates Paramount Skydance at underperform, says 'big picture is cloudy'
item.description: Analyst Jessica Ehrlich said the stock's risk/reward ratio appears unfavorable in the near term.
